Every night I would pray that my son's blindness would be cured. After many nights weeping in my bed, I sat down infront of my computer to relax. After searching the steam market I decided to buy a game called Ricochet. Little did I know that I would be in the presense of God while playing it. Immediatly after launching the game, my son's blindless was cured instantly. I believe that this game deserves the BGOAT award. (Best Game Of All Time)

One of the awesome classic games out there! Seriously, it is very much underrated. Though it's very hard to find players in servers nowadays; occasionally you find a server with some players and it's a fun game. Nice concept by the Valve and very unique one, even no modern games have pretty much developed on this idea. Sometimes i think that if Valve had promoted the game well, it'd have been at a much higher level than what it is atm. I surely say, if this game got more players i'd be way more better than many of the modern games. It's a gem which is buried deep in the ground, all we need to do is work together and pull it out.....

10/10 always love playing it when it has players.

Richochet has won many awards including the [b] UGLIEST GRAPHICS [/b] and also the [b] #1 WORST GAME TO ACTUALLY PAY FOR [/b] award back in 2013.

Hopefully, we can all agree that this game is out of its time and should be let go.

This game saved me from type four pancreatic cancer when it was terminal. I love this game with so much passion. It is the most beautiful creation that has ever existed and I think that God himself has blessed this game. It's so wonderful and the plotline is the most intriguing thing I have ever seen. And it is even MULTIPLAYER!!!! I'm baffled at the graphics and how realistic they are for the time it was made. I thought that real actors were used to make this game. The tournaments are nailbiting and I am always on the edge of my seat watching this game. I would pay thousands to play this game, but I GOT IT FOR A BUCK DURING THE SALE!!! 100/10 WOULD BUY AGAIN!!!

Oh my god, this game is wonderful!

Sadly, there are not many servers running this game anymore.

Nevertheless, the day I spent running around trying to kill people with my disk in the first real 3d Tron game was amazing. 

It would be great if comunities would start building up for this game.

Nobody wants to play this game with me, and it makes me mad.

Please just buy it.

Picked it up through the vavle complete pack during the summer sale. Tried it out for 15 minutes. It was a wasteland.  Got on the only server I saw with one other person. Person was idle. Other people ACTUALLY joined. Played with them for a couple minutes (more like 5) until they left. It was alright, but it would have been WAYYYY better with way more people. The concept is great but the variety of things that the game offers you just does not make it worth it for the long run, which ended up killing the playerbase. Keep in mind that this game was pre-steam. Back then (with more players) it would have even been a mixed bag. If you are looking for some quick games where you jump around and throw disks, then here you go. But with the dead playerbase, this makes it the only valve game I would stay away from. Sorry Gaben, but this isn't worth it. Release Ricochet 2 tho, so you can turn it into something better.

Ricochet это энергичный шутер для несколько игроков. Понравился геймплей своей быстрой и ловкой игрой. Нормальная графика для 2000 года. Можно сыграть с ботами или позвать людей играть, но сервера пустуют. И мало карт для игры. Но сойдет для игры. Хорошая идея с дисками которые тут вместо оружия которые рикошетят от бортиков.

[h1]No gastes tu tiempo, ni tu dinero en este juego[/h1]

Tengo este juego porque viene en el "Valve complete pack" y traté de jugarlo con mucha expectativa ya que creo que valve hizo algunos de los mejores juegos que existen (ej.: la saga Half-Life, la saga Portal, etc). La verdad es un juego que parece bastante entretenido, pero estas son razones suficientes para no recomendarlo:

[olist]
[*] El juego cuenta solo con 3 mapas muy básicos, lo cual es algo pobre para un juego online de hoy en día.
[*] La gente ya no lo juega. He entrado varias veces para intentar jugarlo pero con mucha suerte solo encuentras uno o dos servidores, con 2 o 3 jugadores.
[*] No puedes jugar solo. Al carecer de bots y de un modo historia solo puedes meterte a tirar discos al vacío.
[*] Por último, pero no menos importante: la gran cantidad de lag... o latencia, como gusten. Esto último ha hecho que me saquen (las pocas veces que encontre servidores activos) por tener mucho ping.
[/olist]

La verdad me hubiese gustado probar este juego en su época dorada, si es que la tuvo. Es un juego que está totalmente muerto, salvo que valve decida hacer un remake o una segunda parte.
I love it with all my heart I could find myself feeling down then I just have to look at my steam library and open it and im already feeling better about myself!
